channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- PeopleSoft Enterprise CS SA Integration Pack
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- PeopleSoft Enterprise CS SA Integration Pack

item.title: CVE-2022-21300|2024-08-03T02:38:55.300Z -- oracle%20corporation -- peoplesoft%20enterprise%20cs%20sa%20integration%20pack
item.description: Vulnerability in the PeopleSoft Enterprise CS SA Integration Pack product of Oracle PeopleSoft (component: Snapshot Integration). Supported versions that are affected are 9.0 and 9.2. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise PeopleSoft Enterprise CS SA Integration Pack. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all PeopleSoft Enterprise CS SA Integration Pack accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 7.5 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N).
